urls.title: Husband and wife poison themselves trying to self-medicate with chloroquine
urls.description: An Arizona man is dead and his wife is hospitalized after both of them self-medicated with chloroquine.

text:
@BillOReilly I think the concern is more for others that may try to follow the 🤡 remember this 👇 also think Trump is just trying to hype up the sell of drug he has stocks in.
